name: Planetary Shuffle
description:
Planetary Shuffle takes popular match-3 formula into space.

Features:

  1. Move around planets to create a line of 3 or more to score points.
  2. Use special abilities to change the planets directly to help score more points.
  3. Save your achievements on global scoreboard for the world to see.
  4. Create online profile to save your progress and scores on cloud.
  5. Tutorial that explains abilities and other features.
  6. NEW! Challenge your friend to a 1 vs 1 duel!

Planned features:

  1. Information screen when selecting each planet on the spaceboard.

Short description of online features and how they work:

The game doesn't require network access in offline mode. However, online features are disabled. All scoreboards will be saved locally and you will not see global scoreboards. Your progress is also saved locally.

When online mode is on, your scores will be saved on the global scoreboards when you press Save Score button after the result is displayed. Your progress in online mode is saved on the server. Your offline progress can not be transferred to the server to prevent cheating, so if you're planning to play online please consider doing so from the beginning to not start over when switching into online mode.

Important: when making online account, please write down your password! We do not store passwords and do not have password reset feature yet, so please keep your password safe. Password must include a letter, a digit and a special character (like "!" or similar), and must be 8 characters long. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Duel system description:

To be able to challenge your friend to a duel you must enable online mode. When challenging a friend an automatic email will be sent to them with a duel code and a link to download the game. Your friend then will have to install the game, enable online mode, and go to Duel Challenges Menu from Main Menu screen to Accept Duel. They will then complete the challenge and the score will be updated. You can view your duels in My Duels list in the Duel Challenges Menu. If the duel has a "?" mark in the score - it hasn't been accepted yet.

Please, let us know about bugs, missing features or your suggestions in the comments!
